A sermon preached at Christ-Church in Bristol, before the Right Honourable Sr. Francis North, lord chief justice of His Majesty's Court of Common-Pleas at the assizes held there, August 7th, anno Dom. 1675 / by Richard Standfast ... Standfast, Richard, 1608?-1684.
[5], 30 p.
Printed by A.M. for Charles Allen, bookseller in Bristol, London : 1676.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
